ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: An 'RStudio' addin for editing a 'data.frame' or a 'tibble'. You can delete, add or update a 'data.frame' without coding. You can get resultant data as a 'data.frame'. In the package, modularized 'shiny' app codes are provided. These modules are intended for reuse across applications.

An 'RStudio' addin for editing a 'data.frame' or a 'tibble'. You can delete, add or update a 'data.frame' without coding. You can get resultant data as a 'data.frame'. In the package, modularized 'shiny' app codes are provided. These modules are intended for reuse across applications.

name: r-editdata
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.1.8' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-editdata
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/editData_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/editData/editData_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: d468192c88f7feb8d166d9d2bb0b0fdf5201dfbe662d54a009477e62c445119c

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-dt >=0.17
    - r-dplyr
    - r-magrittr
    - r-miniui >=0.1.1
    - r-openxlsx
    - r-rio
    - r-rstudioapi >=0.5
    - r-shiny >=0.13
    - r-shinywidgets
    - r-tibble
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-dt >=0.17
    - r-dplyr
    - r-magrittr
    - r-miniui >=0.1.1
    - r-openxlsx
    - r-rio
    - r-rstudioapi >=0.5
    - r-shiny >=0.13
    - r-shinywidgets
    - r-tibble

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('editData')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('editData')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/cardiomoon/editData
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: An 'RStudio' addin for editing a 'data.frame' or a 'tibble'. You can delete, add or
    update a 'data.frame' without coding. You can get resultant data as a 'data.frame'.
    In the package, modularized 'shiny' app codes are provided. These modules are intended
    for reuse across applications.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: editData
# Type: Package
# Title: 'RStudio' Addin for Editing a 'data.frame'
# Version: 0.1.8
# Imports: shiny (>= 0.13), miniUI (>= 0.1.1), rstudioapi (>= 0.5), DT(>= 0.17), tibble, dplyr, rio, magrittr, shinyWidgets, openxlsx
# Authors@R: person("Keon-Woong", "Moon", email = "cardiomoon@gmail.com", role = c("aut", "cre"))
# Description: An 'RStudio' addin for editing a 'data.frame' or a 'tibble'. You can delete, add or update a 'data.frame' without coding. You can get resultant data as a 'data.frame'. In the package, modularized 'shiny' app codes are provided. These modules are intended for reuse across applications.
# URL: https://github.com/cardiomoon/editData
# BugReports: https://github.com/cardiomoon/editData/issues
# License: GPL-3
# Encoding: UTF-8
# Depends: R (>= 2.10)
# LazyData: true
# RoxygenNote: 7.1.1
# Suggests: knitr, rmarkdown
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2021-04-02 16:38:19 UTC; imac
# Author: Keon-Woong Moon [aut, cre]
# Maintainer: Keon-Woong Moon <cardiomoon@gmail.com>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2021-04-02 17:00:02 UTC
